description.value: You've learned more naga magic. During your daily preparations, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Charm]{Charm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Fleet Step]{Fleet Step}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal}. You can cast the chosen spell as a 1st-level occult innate spell once that day.

value.value: at least one innate spell from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat
